short_summary: Notice: Advanced Contract Award - Correctional Service of Canada is seeking to provide Elder services to Inner Usual - bourgeois.
description: CSC is seeking to provide Elder services primarily to indigenous offenders. An advance contract award notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends. This allows other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements set out in the ACAN, the contracting officer may then proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.
